languages.text: {n}Лицо маршала остается непроницаемым.{/n} "Наши разногласия с префектом были разрешены в тот момент, когда появились вы. Теперь к делу".
{n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо маршала остается непроницаемым.{/n} "Наши разногласия с префектом были разрешены в тот момент, когда появились вы. Теперь к делу".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."
{n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."
{n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."
{n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."
{n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."
{n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal affiche une expression impénétrable.{/n} « Maintenant que vous êtes là, le désaccord qui m'opposait à la préfète n'a plus lieu d'être. Revenons-en plutôt à l'affaire qui nous intéresse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal affiche une expression impénétrable.{/n} « Maintenant que vous êtes là, le désaccord qui m'opposait à la préfète n'a plus lieu d'être. Revenons-en plutôt à l'affaire qui nous intéresse. »

languages.text: {n}El rostro del Mariscal es impenetrable.{/n} «El desacuerdo entre la prefecta y yo acabó en cuanto llegó. Ahora, pasemos al tema que nos ocupa».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro del Mariscal es impenetrable.{/n} «El desacuerdo entre la prefecta y yo acabó en cuanto llegó. Ahora, pasemos al tema que nos ocupa».

languages.text: {n}元帅的脸上没有任何表情。{/n}“既然你来了，我和行政官之间所有的分歧都不再重要。好了，还是来谈谈当下的问题吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅的脸上没有任何表情。{/n}“既然你来了，我和行政官之间所有的分歧都不再重要。好了，还是来谈谈当下的问题吧。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall verzieht keine Miene.{/n} "Mein Streit mit der Präfektin wurde im Moment Eures Erscheinens beigelegt. Nun aber zum eigentlichen Thema ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall verzieht keine Miene.{/n} "Mein Streit mit der Präfektin wurde im Moment Eures Erscheinens beigelegt. Nun aber zum eigentlichen Thema ..."

languages.text: {n}将帥の顔は頑固である。{/n}「総監と私との間の不和はあなたの到着で解消されました。今は目の前の問題が最優先です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥の顔は頑固である。{/n}「総監と私との間の不和はあなたの到着で解消されました。今は目の前の問題が最優先です」

languages.text: {n}Miralay'ın suratında anlaşılmaz bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Prefekt ile aramızdaki anlaşmazlık, siz geldiğiniz anda sonlandı. Konumuza dönelim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal's face is impenetrable.{/n} "The disagreement between the prefect and myself was put to rest the moment you arrived. Now, to the issue at hand."

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay'ın suratında anlaşılmaz bir ifade beliriyor.{/n} "Prefekt ile aramızdaki anlaşmazlık, siz geldiğiniz anda sonlandı. Konumuza dönelim."
